price: 15. Yalli Nabii Muusak: Aleey koo maqidaanak, koo kee ku- toobokoyta Nabii Haaruun ni- astooti luk gexa, diggah Nanu catoh siinî luk nan isin ittaanam kee siinil gacsaanam naabbchik iyye.
arabic: قَالَ كَلَّاۖ فَٱذۡهَبَا بِـَٔايَٰتِنَآۖ إِنَّا مَعَكُم مُّسۡتَمِعُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: qāla kallā fa-idh'habā biāyātinā innā maʿakum mus'tamiʿūna
